subject: Football
Bankruptcies
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. star Warren Sapp owes more than $6.7 million to creditors and in back child support and alimony, according to a Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing in South Florida.
snippet: The former N.F.L. star Warren Sapp owes more than $6.7 million to creditors and in back child support and alimony, according to a Chapter 7 bankruptcy filing in South Florida.
